article_title: Corporate Bonds Offer Reasons to Be Cheerful—for Some
article_text:
Some fund managers are spotting bargains in the rubble of corporate credit.

Corporate bond prices have plunged this month as investors fret about risky companies’ access to financing and after a high-profile move by fund firm Third Avenue Management LLC to bar investor withdrawals and liquidate a high-yield bond fund.

After stabilizing in...

twitter.description: ECB asset purchases, assurances from the Fed that rate increases will be moderate, attractive yields and the belief that problems in the energy sector aren’t spreading to other areas have led some fund managers to turn more positive.
twitter.title: Corporate Bonds Offer Reasons to Be Cheerful—for Some

image.alt: Corporate bonds offer reasons to be cheerful, for some fund managers
